data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China. Please, stir the 9,027 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 9,027 believers in the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bouyei people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide seekers in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 9,027 believers in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.focus_label: Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary:
the county of Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China has a population of 119,000.

We estimate Qianxinan Buyei and Miao has 9,027 people who might know Jesus, 1,922 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 108,050 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
